items.title: Watch: Moment man's saved from burning LA home
items.description: Retired firefighter Rich Snyder rescued his neighbour when the LA wildfires spread to their street.

items.title: Gaza ceasefire deal being finalised, Palestinian official tells BBC
items.description: US and Israeli officials also said a deal could be finalised this week.

items.title: Sophisticated smuggling tunnel found between US and Mexico
items.description: The underground passage linking Ciudad Juarez with El Paso, Texas, was equipped with lighting and ventilation.

items.title: Video from South African mine shows desperation of illegal miners refusing to leave
items.description: The men have been underground since the police began a crackdown on illegal mining last year.

items.title: Ghana to investigate controversial $400m cathedral project
items.description: Critics say the money could be put to better use in at a time when the country is struggling economically.
